project.description: 根据obs_meta软件包pr的内容自动在obs上进行增加、删除、修改软件包和工程。

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
git config --global http.sslVerify false git config --global http.postBuffer 52428800 git config --global user.email "17621827400@163.com" git config --global user.name "dongjie110" git config --global pull.ff only
if [ ! -d $WORKSPACE/obs_meta ];then cd $WORKSPACE for((i=1;i<=5;i++)); do set +e git clone -b master https://$GiteeCloneUserName:$GiteeClonePassword@gitee.com/dongjie110/obs_meta set -e if [ -d obs_meta ];then if [ "`ls -A obs_meta`" != "" ];then cd obs_meta && git pull && cd - break fi rm -rf obs_meta fi done else rm -rf $WORKSPACE/obs_meta cd $WORKSPACE for((i=1;i<=5;i++)); do set +e git clone -b master https://$GiteeCloneUserName:$GiteeClonePassword@gitee.com/dongjie110/obs_meta set -e if [ -d obs_meta ];then if [ "`ls -A obs_meta`" != "" ];then cd obs_meta && git pull && cd - break fi rm -rf obs_meta fi done fi
if [ ! -d $WORKSPACE/obs_meta ];then echo "ERROR: git clone obs_meta failed." exit 1 fi
sudo su - root <<EOF
git config --global http.sslVerify false git config --global http.postBuffer 52428800 git config --global user.email "17621827400@163.com" git config --global user.name "dongjie110" git config --global pull.ff only
touch ~/.oscrc cat > ~/.oscrc << FEOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 [http://117.78.1.88] user = $OBS_USER pass = $OBS_PWD FEOF
cat ~/.oscrc
#cd $WORKSPACE/obs_meta && git reset --hard ${giteePullRequestLastCommit} && cd - cd $WORKSPACE/obs_meta && git reset --hard c5dc880920daaf716b902a62cee0d05d4352b163 && cd -
cd $WORKSPACE && rm -rf openeuler_obs-* #wget http://172.16.1.95:88/mkb/openeuler-obs/openeuler_obs-v1.3.4-aarch64.tar.gz #tar -xvf openeuler_obs-v1.3.4-aarch64.tar.gz && cd openeuler_obs-v1.3.4-aarch64
wget http://172.16.1.95:88/mkb/openeuler-obs/openeuler_obs-v1.6.1-aarch64.tar.gz tar -xvf openeuler_obs-v1.6.1-aarch64.tar.gz && cd openeuler_obs-v1.6.1-aarch64 echo "test"
./openeuler_obs -r obs_meta -o $WORKSPACE/obs_meta -ip ${OBS_SOURCE_HOST} -suser ${SOURCE_USER} -spwd ${SOURCE_PWD} -guser ${GiteeCloneUserName} -gpwd ${GiteeClonePassword} -cmid c5dc880920daaf716b902a62cee0d05d4352b163 #./openeuler_obs -r obs_meta -o $WORKSPACE/obs_meta -ip ${OBS_SOURCE_HOST} -suser ${SOURCE_USER} -spwd ${SOURCE_PWD} -guser ${GiteeCloneUserName} -gpwd ${GiteeClonePassword} -cmid ${giteePullRequestLastCommit} --sync_code "" EOF
